summary: I HAVE A 2000 HARLEY DAVIDSON XL883C SPORTSTER MOTORCYCLE.  RECENTLY WHILE RIDING, MY REAR TAIL LIGHT LOOSENED UP AND FELL OFF.  THIS IS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION TO BE IN -- FOR BOTH THE OPERATOR OF THE MOTORCYCLE AND THOSE DRIVING BEHIND IT.  THIS IS  A COMMON COMPLIANT FROM FELLOW RIDERS OF THE HD SPORTSTER LINE.  THIS PROBLEM SHOULD BE ADDRESSED AND FIXED BY THE MANUFACTURER.  IT IS A POTENTIALLY DANGEROUS AND UNSAFE CONDITION.
